From Wiktionary, the free dictionary
See also: expoñer

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin expōnere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /eɡspoˈneɾ/ [eɣ̞s.poˈneɾ]
  • Rhymes: -eɾ
  • Syllabification: ex‧po‧ner

Verb

[edit]

exponer (first-person singular present expongo, first-person singular preterite expuse, past participle expuesto)

  1. to exhibit
  2. to expose

2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
